proposal: Understanding the critical mission of GENFIT in tackling ACLF and other severe liver diseases, it's clear your dedication is towards a future where these conditions are no longer life-threatening. With 158 holders in the ETH network, your journey is gaining momentum. Imagine enhancing this journey further by integrating our B2B tools, like a custom DEX or a community-driven lottery, to engage and grow your community, ensuring everyone has a stake in the future you're building.
